item.title: 医生将 Crispr 编辑过的猪肾移植给活体患者
item.description: 医生们成功地将经过基因编辑的猪肾脏移植到一名患有晚期疾病的男子体内，这是利用动物来源帮助缓解器官移植严重短缺问题的一个步骤。【原文：Doctors successfully transplanted a genetically-edited pig kidney into a man with end-stage disease, a step towards using animal sources to help alleviate critical shortages of organs available for transplants.】

item.description:

。【原文：

Fed is providing ‘a lot of liquidity in an already liquid environment,’ Richard Bernstein says

】

item.title: 从苏黎世到伦敦再到华盛顿，大通胀恐慌正在消退
item.description: 从苏黎世到伦敦再到华盛顿，大流行病后笼罩世界经济的巨大通胀恐慌突然不再让央行行长们彻夜难眠。【原文：From Zurich to London to Washington, the great inflation scare that gripped the world economy after the pandemic is suddenly no longer keeping central bankers up at night.】

item.title: 加拿大央行预计量化紧缩政策将于 2025 年结束
item.description: 加拿大央行的一位官员表示，量化紧缩政策可能会在 2025 年结束，届时央行将考虑在一级和二级债务市场购买资产。【原文：A Bank of Canada official said quantitative tightening will likely end in 2025, at which point the central bank will consider purchasing assets in both primary and secondary debt markets.】

item.title: 希腊在住房压力下提高黄金签证投资额
item.description: 希腊政府计划提高潜在外国房产买家为获得黄金签证而必须支付的最低金额，理由是该国的购房和租房市场面临压力。【原文：The Greek government plans to increase the minimum amount that potential foreign property buyers must pay to secure a Golden Visa, citing pressure on the country’s house purchase and rental market.】

item.title: 卖空者再次加大对商业地产的押注
item.description: 地区性银行面临的压力、美国写字楼价格的持续低迷以及利率的升高，使得资金经理们又开始看跌他们最喜欢的行业之一：商业地产。【原文：Pressure at regional banks, a continuing downturn in US office prices and elevated interest rates have money managers piling back into bearish wagers on one of their favorite sectors: commercial property.】

item.title: 佩尔茨在迪士尼董事会之争中获 ISS 和商界领袖支持
item.description: 纳尔逊-佩尔茨（Nelson Peltz）在争取加入娱乐公司华特迪士尼公司（Walt Disney Co.【原文：Nelson Peltz has received the backing of an influential shareholder advisory firm and a group of business leaders in his bid to join the board of entertainment company Walt Disney Co.】

item.title: 瑞士国家银行行长警告：中东冲突威胁通胀缓解
item.description: 瑞士国家银行行长托马斯-乔丹（Thomas Jordan）表示，中东冲突可能会给全球央行带来重大问题。【原文：The conflict in the Middle East could spark major problems for the central banks around the world, according to Swiss National Bank President Thomas Jordan.】

item.title: 摩根大通称英国财政部或将加快 NatWest 退出步伐
item.description: 摩根大通银行（JPMorgan Chase & Co.【原文：NatWest Group Plc’s proposal to allow it to buy back more shares is laying the groundwork for the British government to exit its stake sooner than expected, according to analysts at JPMorgan Chase & Co.】

item.title: 英国央行鹰派成员放弃加息投票后英国债券反弹
item.description: 英国央行两位最鹰派的政策制定者在周四的决定中撤回了对加息的支持，交易商加大了对货币宽松政策的押注，英国债券因此反弹。【原文：UK bonds rallied as traders amped up bets on monetary easing after two of the Bank of England’s most hawkish policymakers withdrew their support for interest rate hikes at Thursday’s decision.】

item.description:
生产商在 CERAWeek 上展开攻势，但贸易组织负责人表示，他们本可以做好更充分的准备。【原文：

Producers are on the offensive at CERAWeek, but trade group head says they could have been better prepared.

】

item.title: 法国兴业银行的卡布拉将 S&P 500 指数目标上调至华尔街最高水平
item.description: 法国兴业银行（Societe Generale SA）策略师表示，在企业盈利前景改善和人工智能热潮的背景下，美股破纪录的涨势势不可挡。【原文：There’s no stopping the record-breaking rally in US stocks against a backdrop of improving outlook for corporate earnings and the frenzy around artificial intelligence, according to Societe Generale SA strategists.】

item.title: 苹果公司首席执行官为上海新店揭幕，彰显对中国的承诺
item.description: 苹果公司（Apple Inc.首席执行官蒂姆-库克（Tim Cook）周四在上海市中心开设了一家规模宏大的新店，标志着该公司将中国作为市场和生产基地的承诺。【原文：Apple Inc. Chief Executive Officer Tim Cook opened an expansive new store in central Shanghai Thursday, signaling his company’s commitment to China as a market and production base.】

item.title: 肯尼亚最大银行修复坏账的努力受到国家和法院的打击
item.description: 由于政府拖延向供应商付款，以及法院禁止出售抵押品以挽回损失，KCB Group Plc.【原文：KCB Group Plc.’s efforts to clean up its loan book of legacy bad debt is being frustrated by government delays in paying suppliers and court injunctions slowing down the sale of collateral to recoup losses.】

item.title: 英国和澳大利亚选择 BAE 公司建造 Aukus 核潜艇舰队
item.description: 澳大利亚和英国选择国防制造商 BAE Systems Plc 和 ASC Pty Ltd 建造一支下一代核动力潜艇舰队，预计将于 2040 年代部署，这是《奥库斯安全条约》（Aukus security treaty）迈出的最新一步。【原文：Australia and the UK selected defense manufacturers BAE Systems Plc and ASC Pty Ltd to build a fleet of next generation nuclear-powered submarines that are expected to be deployed in the 2040s, the latest step in the Aukus security pact.】

item.title: 现金充裕的思科转为净负债，以实现增长和回报
item.description: 对于思科系统公司（Cisco Systems Inc. ）来说，280 亿美元收购 Splunk 公司不仅标志着其迄今为止最大的多元化努力，也标志着其向净债务资本地位的历史性转变，旨在促进增长和股东回报。【原文：For Cisco Systems Inc., the $28 billion acquisition of Splunk Inc. marks not only its biggest diversification effort to date but a historic shift to a net debt capital position designed to bolster growth and shareholder returns.】

item.title: 阿布扎比 IHC 计划明年将价值 270 亿美元的控股公司上市
item.description: 据阿布扎比最大的上市公司首席执行官称，这家由酋长国王室重要成员领导的公司正寻求在明年之前将一家价值超过 1000 亿迪拉姆（约合 270 亿美元）的控股公司上市。【原文：Abu Dhabi’s largest listed company, led by a key member of the emirate’s royal family, is looking to list a holding firm worth more than 100 billion dirhams ($27 billion) by next year, according to its chief executive officer.】

item.title: Signa 债权人要求对 7 亿美元失踪资金做出答复
item.description: 在周一支持了一项重组计划后，Signa Holding GmbH 旗下一家重要房地产公司的债券持有人仍在要求对一批价值约 6.75 亿欧元（约合 7.37 亿美元）的资金失踪一事做出答复。【原文：After backing a restructuring plan on Monday, bondholders of one of Signa Holding GmbH’s key property units are still demanding answers over a missing batch of funds worth around €675 million ($737 million.)】

item.title: 土耳其在投票前意外加息以稳定里拉汇率
item.description: 土耳其央行周四提高了利率，这一出人意料的决定恰好是在大选之前做出的，显示了在经历大跌之后支撑里拉的紧迫性。【原文：Turkey’s central bank raised interest rates on Thursday, a surprise decision just ahead of elections that shows the urgency of supporting the lira after a selloff.】

item.title: 在阿根廷创纪录的互换交易中，交易员利用幽灵债券赚取了 20% 的利润
item.description: 一小部分精明的投资者在阿根廷创纪录的 500 亿美元地方债务置换中获得了 20% 的收益，尽管他们实际上并没有交出符合条件的债券。【原文：A small group of savvy investors made 20% gains in Argentina’s record $50 billion local debt swap despite not actually handing over eligible bonds.】

item.title: 中东顶级杂货连锁店 LuLu 据称将向银行申请 IPO
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，经营着中东最大连锁大卖场之一的 LuLu 集团国际公司已为今年海湾地区最大的首次公开募股之一指定了银行。【原文：LuLu Group International, which operates one of the Middle East’s largest hypermarket chains, has appointed banks for what could be one of the biggest initial public offerings in the Gulf this year, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事美洲
item.description: 早上好。美联储决议引发股市反弹并创下新纪录，人工智能热潮进一步升温，Reddit 将首次亮相。以下是市场动向。【原文：Good morning. The Fed’s decision sparks a rally and sends stocks to new records, the AI frenzy burnishes that further and Reddit is set to debut. Here’s what’s moving markets. — Sam Unsted】

item.title: 特朗普媒体的大手笔 SPAC 交易将使盟友和敌人都受益匪浅
item.description: 如果这位前总统的媒体初创公司成为一家上市公司，唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）并不是唯一一个将变得更富有的人--至少在纸面上是这样。【原文：Donald Trump isn’t the only one set to become a lot richer if the former president’s media startup debuts as a public company – at least on paper.】

item.title: 中国股市暴跌，中国平安利润意外下滑
item.description: 由于股市下跌损害了投资回报，中国平安保险（集团）股份有限公司去年的利润出人意料地下降了 22.8%。【原文：Ping An Insurance (Group) Co.’s profit unexpectedly fell 22.8% last year as stock-market declines hurt investment returns.】

item.title: 华尔街大佬分享疯狂三月心得
item.description: 每年到了这个时候，你都会做出 "疯狂三月 "的选择，并祈祷你的同事、朋友和家人比你更早 "玩完"。【原文：It’s that time of the year when you make your March Madness picks and pray that your colleagues, friends and family members flame out before you do.】

item.title: 法国 Altice 债权人正与 Houlihan 制定债务计划
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，Altice France 的债权人包括 Attestor Capital 和 Arini，在与该公司进行债务谈判之前，已开始与顾问公司 Houlihan Lokey Inc.【原文：Altice France’s creditors including Attestor Capital and Arini have started working with advisers Houlihan Lokey Inc. and law firm Milbank LLP ahead of debt talks with the company, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 空中客车公司在波音两大市场赢得宽体喷气机订单
item.description: 空中客车公司（Airbus SE）从日本和韩国的旗舰航空公司获得了两份大订单，使这家欧洲制造商在传统上倾向于老对手波音公司的市场上取得了战略性胜利。【原文：Airbus SE secured two major orders from the flagship carriers of Japan and South Korea, giving the European manufacturer a strategic win in markets that have traditionally leaned toward arch-rival Boeing Co.】

item.title: 巴基斯坦航空公司私有化取得进展，收益扩大至 600
item.description: 随着政府出售国有航空公司的计划取得进展，巴基斯坦国际航空公司的股价创下历史新高。【原文：Shares of Pakistan International Airlines rallied to a record as the government’s bid to sell the state-owned carrier made progress.】
